item.title: APSB24-45: Security update available for Adobe After Effects
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe After Effects. These updates resolve important vulnerabilities that could lead to arbitrary code execution.
Products: Adobe After Effects 2024, Adobe After Effects 2023 Severity: Important
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/after_effects/apsb24-45.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
